name: BulkSwapSubscriptionPlan
description:
Schedule a plan variation swap for multiple subscriptions.

This tool schedules a swap of plan variations for all active subscriptions under a specified plan variation. It is used when there is a need to change the plan variation for multiple subscriptions simultaneously.

parameters.name: new_plan_variation_id
parameters.description: The ID of the new subscription plan variation for the swap. This field is required.

value_schema.description:
The ID of the new subscription plan variation.

This field is required.

parameters.name: old_plan_variation_id
parameters.description: The ID of the current plan variation to swap. Active subscriptions using this plan will switch to the new variation on their next billing day.

value_schema.description:
The ID of the plan variation whose subscriptions should be swapped. Active subscriptions
using this plan variation will be subscribed to the new plan variation on their next billing
day.

parameters.name: location_id_association
parameters.description: The ID of the location to associate with the swapped subscriptions. This specifies where the subscription changes are applied.

value_schema.description: The ID of the location to associate with the swapped subscriptions.
